summary: REQ-1/2/3 are largely implemented: slider range updated to 10â€“200 with clamping, presets updated to stay within range, and uiScale is clamped on load/save and when applied to CSS variable. A few UI enhancements (tooltips/help text) and slider step changes appear beyond the request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added tooltip UI around the settings trigger button (TooltipProvider/Tooltip/TooltipContent) for 'UI Scale Settings'.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to expand the scale range and harden clamping; it does not request new tooltip behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed slider behavior to use a fixed step of 5.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies min/max and clamping but does not mention altering the slider step granularity.

hallucinated_features.description: Added explanatory help text under the presets ('Adjust the UI size for better readability...').
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest is scoped to scale range/presets/clamping and explicitly lists non-goals about adding unrelated settings.
